description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Windows Storage Port Driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43560), apply the following updates:

1. Identify the correct update package based on your version of Windows from the provided list.
2. Download the corresponding KB Article from the official Microsoft catalog using the links below.
3. Install the update on your system.
4. Restart your system after the installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This set of updates resolves an elevation of privilege vulnerability within the Microsoft Windows Storage Port Driver. It is important to ensure that your operating system is properly updated to prevent security risks. Update packages can be found here:
- [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
- [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
- [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
- [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
- [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system matches one of the specific versions provided.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
